--- graph_hints_between.sql
GRAPH FinGraph
MATCH
  (p:Person {id: 1})-[e:Owns]->
  @{JOIN_METHOD=APPLY_JOIN}
  ((a:Account)-[s:Transfers]->(oa:Account))
RETURN oa.id
--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    Graph:             0,
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 6,
      NameEnd: 14,
      Name:    "FinGraph",
    },
  },
  MultiLinearQueryStatement: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    LinearQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLMatchStatement{
            Optional:     -1,
            Match:        15,
            MatchHint:    (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            PrefixOrMode: nil,
            GraphPattern: &ast.GQLGraphPattern{
              PathPatternList: []*ast.GQLTopLevelPathPattern{
                &ast.GQLTopLevelPathPattern{
                  PathSearchPrefixOrPathMode: nil,
                  PathPattern:                &ast.GQLPathPattern{
                    PathTermList: []*ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                      &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                        Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                        PathTerm: &ast.GQLNodePattern{
                          LParen:        23,
                          RParen:        40,
                          PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                            Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                            GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                              NamePos: 24,
                              NameEnd: 25,
                              Name:    "p",
                            },
                            IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                              IsOrColon:       25,
                              LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                StartPos:  26,
                                IsPercent: false,
                                LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                  NamePos: 26,
                                  NameEnd: 32,
                                  Name:    "Person",
                                },
                              },
                            },
                            Filter: &ast.GQLPropertyFilters{
                              LBrace:                 33,
                              PropertyFilterElemList: []*ast.GQLElementProperty{
                                &ast.GQLElementProperty{
                                  ElementPropertyName: &ast.Ident{
                                    NamePos: 34,
                                    NameEnd: 36,
                                    Name:    "id",
                                  },
                                  ElementPropertyValue: &ast.IntLiteral{
                                    ValuePos: 38,
                                    ValueEnd: 39,
                                    Base:     10,
                                    Value:    "1",
                                  },
                                },
                              },
                              RBrace: 39,
                            },
                          },
                        },
                        Quantifier: nil,
                      },
                      &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                        Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                        PathTerm: &ast.GQLFullEdgeRight{
                          Hyphen:        41,
                          Gt:            50,
                          PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                            Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                            GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                              NamePos: 43,
                              NameEnd: 44,
                              Name:    "e",
                            },
                            IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                              IsOrColon:       44,
                              LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                StartPos:  45,
                                IsPercent: false,
                                LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                  NamePos: 45,
                                  NameEnd: 49,
                                  Name:    "Owns",
                                },
                              },
                            },
                            Filter: nil,
                          },
                        },
                        Quantifier: nil,
                      },
                      &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                        Hint: &ast.Hint{
                          Atmark:  55,
                          Rbrace:  79,
                          Records: []*ast.HintRecord{
                            &ast.HintRecord{
                              Key: &ast.Ident{
                                NamePos: 57,
                                NameEnd: 68,
                                Name:    "JOIN_METHOD",
                              },
                              Value: &ast.Ident{
                                NamePos: 69,
                                NameEnd: 79,
                                Name:    "APPLY_JOIN",
                              },
                            },
                          },
                        },
                        PathTerm: &ast.GQLSubpathPattern{
                          LParen:      83,
                          RParen:      123,
                          PathMode:    (*ast.GQLPathMode)(nil),
                          PathPattern: &ast.GQLPathPattern{
                            PathTermList: []*ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                              &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                                Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                PathTerm: &ast.GQLNodePattern{
                                  LParen:        84,
                                  RParen:        94,
                                  PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                                    Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                    GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                                      NamePos: 85,
                                      NameEnd: 86,
                                      Name:    "a",
                                    },
                                    IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                                      IsOrColon:       86,
                                      LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                        StartPos:  87,
                                        IsPercent: false,
                                        LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                          NamePos: 87,
                                          NameEnd: 94,
                                          Name:    "Account",
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    Filter: nil,
                                  },
                                },
                                Quantifier: nil,
                              },
                              &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                                Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                PathTerm: &ast.GQLFullEdgeRight{
                                  Hyphen:        95,
                                  Gt:            109,
                                  PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                                    Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                    GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                                      NamePos: 97,
                                      NameEnd: 98,
                                      Name:    "s",
                                    },
                                    IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                                      IsOrColon:       98,
                                      LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                        StartPos:  99,
                                        IsPercent: false,
                                        LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                          NamePos: 99,
                                          NameEnd: 108,
                                          Name:    "Transfers",
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    Filter: nil,
                                  },
                                },
                                Quantifier: nil,
                              },
                              &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                                Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                PathTerm: &ast.GQLNodePattern{
                                  LParen:        111,
                                  RParen:        122,
                                  PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                                    Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                    GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                                      NamePos: 112,
                                      NameEnd: 114,
                                      Name:    "oa",
                                    },
                                    IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                                      IsOrColon:       114,
                                      LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                        StartPos:  115,
                                        IsPercent: false,
                                        LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                          NamePos: 115,
                                          NameEnd: 122,
                                          Name:    "Account",
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    Filter: nil,
                                  },
                                },
                                Quantifier: nil,
                              },
                            },
                          },
                          WhereClause: (*ast.Where)(nil),
                        },
                        Quantifier: nil,
                      },
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
              WhereClause: (*ast.Where)(nil),
            },
          },
          &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
            Return:         125,
            AllOrDistinct:  "",
            ReturnItemList: []ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.ExprSelectItem{
                Expr: &ast.Path{
                  Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                    &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 132,
                      NameEnd: 134,
                      Name:    "oa",
                    },
                    &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 135,
                      NameEnd: 137,
                      Name:    "id",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            GroupByClause:        (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
            OrderByClause:        (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
            LimitAndOffsetClause: nil,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH FinGraph
MATCH (p:Person {id: 1})-[e:Owns]->@{JOIN_METHOD=APPLY_JOIN}((a:Account)-[s:Transfers]->(oa:Account))
RETURN oa.id
